overview:
Leland Rechis is the Director of Product at Etsy, leading the Product team for the company.

Previously he led mobile product at Twitter and brought apps and partner integrations to all major mobile platforms (Android, iOS, SMS, WindowsPhone)

Previously, he was a UX designer on the launch team of Android OS, and lead the design of Android Market.

He also has worked closely with the Japan market, launching Twitter mobile, Google transit, Android localizations and redesigning mobile search specifically for Japanese handsets.

He worked at a number of digital consultancies including Razorfish and Organic, launching large e-commerce experiences for top brands, including Starbucks, Barnes and Noble and Sony PlayStation.
